item.description:
This event is Hosted by the Motorcycle Riders Meetup Group,

Michael (KLR Kid) Says..

This event is the first of its kind, heck, we won't even be riding to the event, so feel free to melt the igloo of isolation and join us for a round of live music and shop talk about whatever you ride, the gear you wear or upcoming events.

Your participation is key to the success of the shin dig, so RSVP that you can make it, and come on down and join us for some grub, a few laughs, and some talented local acoustic artists including Danielle Miraglia and Tom Bianci, hosts of the open mic shows in Cambridge and Somerville. And you are more than welcome to bring guests, family members or motorcycling enthusiasts - All are Welcome.

If any members want to chime in with vocals and or play an instrument themselves, whether a 6 string guitar, drums, horn or otherwise - let me know, you're more than welcome to showcase your hidden talents, so the opportunity is there.

Maximum cost is $15 per person which will cover the buffett and the live music.
item.name: 2 Wheel Winter Wonderland party
